code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import penderMiddleware from'redux-pender';import modules from'./modules';var isDevelopment=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development';var composeEnhancers=isDevelopment?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose:compose;var configureStore=function configureStore(initialState){var store=createStore(modules,initialState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(penderMiddleware())));return store;};export default configureStore;
